reasoningText.text:

2. Check for pom.xml or build.gradle files
3. Identify Java version configurations
4. Update build files to use Java 17
5. Update dependencies to Java 17 compatible versions
6. Check for any Java 8 specific code that needs updating
7. Run mvn clean verify to ensure everything works

# Java 17 Migration Summary

## Overview
This document summarizes the migration of the Visor project from Java 8 to Java 17.

## Changes Made

### 1. Parent POM Configuration (`pom.xml`)

#### Removed Parent Dependency
- Removed the non-resolvable parent POM reference to `io.github.cloudiator:project:0.3.0-SNAPSHOT`
- Made the project self-contained with all dependency management

#### Java Version Configuration
- Set `maven.compiler.source` to `17`
- Set `maven.compiler.target` to `17`
- Set `maven.compiler.release` to `17`

#### Dependency Version Updates

Updated all major dependencies to Java 17 compatible versions:

| Dependency | Old Version | New Version |
|------------|-------------|-------------|
| commons-cli | 1.2 | 1.6.0 |
| guice | N/A | 5.1.0 |
| guava | N/A | 33.0.0-jre |
| jackson | N/A | 2.17.2 |
| slf4j | N/A | 2.0.16 |
| logback | N/A | 1.5.6 |
| junit | N/A | 4.13.2 |
| hamcrest | N/A | 1.3 |
| jsr305 | N/A | 3.0.2 |
| jersey | N/A | 2.41 |
| reflections | 0.9.11 | 0.10.2 |
| activemq | 5.15.2 | 5.18.3 |
| influxdb | 2.4 | 2.24 |
| kairosdb | 2.0/3.0.2 | 2.2.0 |
| httpcomponents | 4.4.1 | 4.5.14 |
| commons-csv | 1.2 | 1.10.0 |

#### Added Dependencies
